dependenciesComments.tslib: A runtime library that optimises TypeScript applications.

devDependenciesComments.@trivago/prettier-plugin-sort-imports: A Prettier plugin that sorts import statements.
devDependenciesComments.@types/eslint: A set of type definitions for ESLint configuration files.
devDependenciesComments.@types/node: A set of type definitions for Node modules to be used in configuration files and test stubs.
devDependenciesComments.@types/prettier: A set of type definitions for Prettier configuration files.
devDependenciesComments.@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in TypeScript code. It must always match the version of '@typescript-eslint/parser'.
devDependenciesComments.@typescript-eslint/parser: An ESLint plugin that lets it parse TypeScript sources. It must always match the version of '@typescript-eslint/eslint-plugin'.
devDependenciesComments.@vitest/coverage-c8: A Vitest plugin that provides code coverage.
devDependenciesComments.@vitest/ui: A Vitest plugin that provides a user interface in the web browser.
devDependenciesComments.eslint: ESLint; a static program analysis tool that uncovers issues in JavaScript code.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-eslint-comments: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in the use of ESLint comments.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-functional: An ESLint plugin that encourages principles from the functional programming paradigm.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-jest: An ESLint plugin that uncovers issues in test suites in Jest (and Vitest whose API is compatible with that of Jest).
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-redundant-undefined: An ESLint plugin that uncovers inconsistencies in optional type declarations.
devDependenciesComments.eslint-plugin-unicorn: An ESLint plugin that complements the built-in set of rules.
devDependenciesComments.prettier: Prettier; an opinionated code formatter that respects the '.editorconfig' file.
devDependenciesComments.simple-git-hooks: A tool that manages Git hooks, e.g. to validate the software quality before committing changes to the repository.
devDependenciesComments.typescript: TypeScript; a statically typed programming language that extends the JavaScript syntax.
devDependenciesComments.vite: Vite; a frontend build tool with native support for hot module replacement.
devDependenciesComments.vitest: Vitest; a unit testing framework that uses the Vite build configuration natively.

scripts.setup: yarn run setup:install-dependencies && yarn run setup:install-git-hooks
scripts.validate: yarn run validate:types && yarn run validate:format && yarn run validate:lint && yarn run validate:test
